channel.title: Server Status problems
channel.description: Yeh, someone keeps using my ip and it sais "sorry you can only post one server" and it won't let me post my server -.-' getting annoyed with my ip being stolen like this. Make it so you have to verify that it is YOUR server and NO ONE elses server.

item.title: Server Status problems
item.dc:creator: @Rickpwns Rickpwns
item.description:
@Rickpwns wrote:

Your server might still be on the list somewhere. Mine took like 4-5 days to get off the list. D:

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status problems

item.description:
@killa1189 wrote:

Yeh, someone keeps using my ip and it sais “sorry you can only post one server” and it won’t let me post my server -.-’ getting annoyed with my ip being stolen like this. Make it so you have to verify that it is YOUR server and NO ONE elses server.
